BillingBatchScheduler.name: BillingBatchScheduler
BillingBatchScheduler.description: Represents a scheduled processing job that triggers recurring invoice batch runs.

BillingSchedulerName.description: Required. The name of the scheduler.

Comments.description: Additional details about the billing batch scheduler.

CronExpression.description: Required. This field determines how often the scheduler recurs.

EndDate.description: The date when the scheduler stops triggering batch processing jobs.

FrequencyCadence.description: Required. The frequency of the scheduler triggering the invoice batch run.

FrequencyOptions.description: This field is a derived field that stores the scheduler configuration.

JobType.description: Required. The type of batch processing job that the scheduler triggers.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed a billing batch scheduler record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a billing batch scheduler record. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user only accessed the billing batch scheduler record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the billing batch scheduler record itself.

NextRunTime.description: The date and timestamp of the next scheduled batch invoice run in the user's time zone.

OwnerId.description: Required. The ID of the user who created the scheduler.

RecurringSubType.description: The frequency at which the batch processing job recurs when the FrequencyCadence field value is set to Monthly.

RecurringType.description: The frequency at which the batch processing job is repeated when the FrequencyCadence field value is set to Weekly.

RecursOn.description: The interval at which the scheduler triggers a batch processing job.

RecursOnDate.description: The date on which the scheduler triggers a batch processing job.

RecursOnDay.description: The day on which the scheduler triggers a batch processing job.

RunCriteriaId.description: Required. The ID of the filter criteria that’s defined for the invoice batch run or the payment batch run.

ShouldExcludeWkendAndHldy.description: Required. Indicates whether weekends and holidays are excluded from the billing schedule (true) or not (false).

ShouldStartRunImmediately.description: Required. Indicates whether the invoice scheduler must start the run immediately (true) or not (false).

StartDate.description: Required. The date when the scheduler triggers its first batch processing job.

StartTime.description: Required. The time when the scheduler triggers the batch processing job.

Status.description: Required. The status of the scheduler. Only active schedulers can trigger batch processing jobs.

TimeZone.description: The time zone is either the value selected when the run was configured, or it's the user's time zone. The time zone is shown in Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

BillingBatchScheduler.accessRules: the Billing Admin permission set to access this object
